56958.「ご苦労さま <pc>。\n あなたも ここに 来ていたのね。:
Oh, <pc>. I'm glad to see that you've
come here as well.

56959.「お初に お目にかかります 大神官さま。\n 私は グランゼドーラ王国の王女\n:
It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance,
Your Grace. I am Anlucia, princess of Gran
Zedora.

56960.「ほほう……。\n そなたが 勇者姫アンルシアか。\n して 何用があって この:
Hoho... so you're the Hero Princess Anlucia,
are you? What brings you to this temple?

56961.「私は レンダーシアを守護する要石……\n 神の緋石を守るため ここに 参りまし:
I've come to protect the Divine Crimsonite
that protects Lendersia. The Demon Lord is
currently targeting them.

56962.「このダーマ神殿は レンダーシアにおいて\n 聖なる場所と あがめられています。:
Alltrades Abbey is revered as a holy place in
Lendersia. Perhaps a Divine Crimsonite is
here?

56963.「……むむむ。神の緋石とやらのことは知らんが\n わしの見た夢と 関係があるやも:
Hmm... Divine Crimsonite doesn't ring any
bells, but that might be related to a dream
I recently had...

56964.「この神殿の奥。天願の座と呼ばれる場所に\n ダーマのご神体が 納められておる。:
Behind this temple, there's a place called the
Divine Seat, which holds the Avatar of
Alltrades. I dreamed of its destruction...

56965.「……なるほど。そのご神体こそが\n 神の緋石なのかも しれません。:
I see... then that avatar may be the Divine
Crimsonite.

56966.「どうにも その夢が気になってのう。\n わしは ご神体の無事を確認するため\n:
That dream had me curious... so I thought I'd
check on the avatar just in case.

56967.「それは ちょうど よかった。\n 私と 勇者の盟友である <pc>も\n 同行:
That's fine. Do you mind if we both come with
you?

56968.「なんと！ この者は 勇者の盟友であったのか。: Oh! You must be the Hero's Ally!

56969.「私の持つ 勇者のチカラを注ぎ込むことで\n 神の緋石は 神代の時代のチカラを取:
By infusing it with the Hero's power, the
Divine Crimsonite will regain its power and
keep evil at bay.

56970.「おお。それならば 断る理由はない。\n わしからも 同行をお願いしたいくらいじ:
I see. Then there's no reason for me to
refuse. Please accompany me.

56971.「天願の座の入り口を開く 祈りの儀を\n すぐに とりおこなうとしよう。\n 地:
We will perform the ritual for the opening of
the Divine Seat. Please make your way to
the Ritual Hall in the basement.

56972.「ご協力に感謝いたします 大神官さま。\n では 私たちは 儀式の間へ向かいます:
Thank you for your assistance.
We will follow you there.

56973.「何が起こるか わからないから\n <pc>にも 来てもらいたいの。\n あなた:
I'm not sure what'll happen, so I can ask you
to come with me?

56975.「勇者姫 それに <pc>よ。\n 待たせて すまんかったのう。: Sorry to keep you both waiting.

56976.「さっそく 祈りの儀を とりおこなうでな。\n おふたりは 下がっておられよ。:
I will now perform the ritual. Please stand
back.

56977.「……ジュアロよ。浄化の種火を。: Juaro. The Purifying Flame, if you please.

56979.「……おお 天よ。我は願い 我は祈る。\n 我を その座に 導きたまえー。\n:
To the Allmighty One, I wish and pray...
To the throne room, show me the way...
My wish delivered, here to stay...

56981.「それでは 天願の座へ おもむこう。\n 皆の者 わしについてまいれ。:
Please follow me to the Divine Seat, if you
would.

56982.「<pc> 私たちも 行きましょう。\n 神の緋石があるなら 勇者のチカラを\n:
Let's go. If there's a Divine Crimsonite
there, I must infuse it with my power.

56983.「見て <cs_pchero>。\n やはり ダーマのご神体は 神の緋石だったわ:
Look, <cs_pchero>. I knew it.
The Avatar of Alltrades is really just the
Divine Crimsonite. It's still intact...

56984.「……ああ。確かに ご神体は\n 神の緋石であったようじゃな。:
Ah, indeed. The avatar seems to be the Divine
Crimsonite after all.

56985.「緋石の輝きが かなり落ちているわ。\n 今すぐに 勇者のチカラを注ぎ込みましょ:
It's lost most of its power... so I'll infuse
it with the Hero's power now.

56986.「そうすれば もう大丈夫です。\n 大神官さまの見た夢が 現実にならなくて\n:
Then everything will be fine. I'm relieved
that your bad dream didn't end up coming
true...

56987.「……それは どうでございましょうねえ？\n 夢が現実となるのは これからなので:
Oh... so that's what you think, hm? That dream
is just starting to come true now!

56989.「まさか 勇者とその盟友を引き連れて\n 神の緋石と 対面することになろうとは…:
I never thought I'd bait both the Hero and
Ally with the Divine Crimsonite. Let's
just call it a happy miscalculation.

56990.「神の緋石もろとも 邪魔者どもを\n 亡き者にできるとは なんたる幸運！\n そ:
How fortunate that I can destroy the stone and
these annoying brats in one fell swoop!

56992.「クククククッ！ 皆さま はじめまして。\n 私の名は ファズマ。\n 幻魔将フ:
Grahahaha! Pleasure to meet you all. You may
address me as Phasma, the Phantom General!

56993.「魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの命により\n この地に隠された 神の緋石を破壊しに\n:
By the order of Marshal Zeldrad, I am to
destroy the Divine Crimsonite hidden in
this land.

56994.「……そんな！？ すでに 大魔王の手の者が\n ダーマ神殿に 潜んでいたなんて！:
No way...the Demon Lord's lackeys were
already hiding here in the Abbey?!

56995.「だっ……大神官さまが 魔物に！？\n うーん……。:
T...the High Priest was a monster all along?!
N-no...

56996.「変幻自在の幻術で ダーマの大神官に化け\n 神の緋石のもとへ侵入する 我が計画:
My plan of using my morphing ability to
impersonate the High Priest and destroy the
stone worked brilliantly!

56997.「そうと気づかず 私のお手伝いをしてくれた\n おろかな方も おられましたがねえ:
And you lot were foolish enough to help me
without even realizing it! Keheheheheh!

56998.「勇者もろとも 神の緋石を闇に葬ってしまえば\n まさに 一石二鳥。大魔王マデサ:
Both the Divine Crimsonite AND the Hero?
Now I can kill two birds with one stone! The
Demon Lord will be most pleased!

56999.「<cs_pchero>。\n こいつを倒して 神の緋石を守るわよ！: We will defeat you and protect the Crimsonite!

57000.「クックックク。威勢のよろしいことで。\n しかし 残念ながら あなた方は\n:
Keheheheh... You have guts, I'll admit. But
alas, you will all meet a swift death.

57002.「この幻術を破らぬ限り あなた方に\n 勝利など ありえないのでございます！\n:
Unless you can see through my illusion, you
have no chance in defeating me!
Kehehehehahahaha!!

57003.「待ちなさい！ 神の緋石を\n 壊させるわけには いかないわ！！:
Stop right there! I will not let you destroy
the Divine Crimsonite!!

57004.「おや……。死にぞこないの勇者と\n その盟友が 黄泉の淵から\n 舞い戻ったよ:
Oh? I had presumed you both dead, but it
appears you've come marching from death's
door to face me yet again.

57005.「何度 来ようとも 同じこと。\n 我が幻術を破らない限り あなた方に\n 勝機:
But, it matters not. No matter how many times
you fight, you have no chance of winning with
my illusions!

57006.「<cs_pchero>。神の緋石を 守り抜くのよ。\n なんとしても こいつを:
We must defend the stone. Let's defeat this
fiend at all costs!

57007.「ククククッ……。相変わらず\n 威勢がよくて ほほえましいこと。\n ですが:
Keheheheh... you've got guts. Unfortunately,
this is your final chance!

57008.「……カァァァッ！？\n なんということで ございましょう！\n 我が幻術が 破:
...What?! How did you... how did you see
through my illusion?!

57009.「……大魔王…マデサゴーラさま。\n 申し訳……あり…せんで………ござ……。:
My lord... Madesagora... I... I...
...have failed you...

57010.「なんとか 倒せたわね……。\n もし 私たちが来る前に 祈りの儀が\n おこな:
We managed to beat him... if that ritual had
taken place before we got here, that would've
been really bad.

57011.「それじゃ 急いで 神の緋石に\n 勇者のチカラを 注ぎ込むことにしましょう。:
Okay. I'll infuse the Divine Crimsonite with
my power.

57012.「……これで ここの神の緋石は\n 神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。\n もう 大魔:
The Divine Crimsonite has regained
its power...not even the Demon Lord
can touch it now.

57014.「あの大神官さまは 魔物が化けていたのです。\n 私たちが倒しましたので ご安心:
Your High Priest was actually a monster in disguise. There's no need to worryーwe've defeated him. The Divine Crimsonite has
regained its power as well.

57015.「そうですか。あれは 魔物が……。: I see. He was a monster...

57016.「では 本物の大神官さまは どこに！？\n 大変だっ。探しにいかなくては！！:
Then where is the real High Priest?! This is
very bad... I must find him!

57017.「こんな手を使ってくるなんて\n 敵も いろいろと考えるものね……。:
It's horrible that our enemies have to resort
to such dirty tactics...

57018.「<cs_pchero>。私は この地の\n 神の緋石が チカラを取り戻したこと:
I'll go and report to Lushenda that the Divine
Crimsonite here has regained its power.

57019.「あなたは 本物の大神官さまの無事を\n 確かめにいってくれる？:
Can you make sure that the real High Priest
is safe?

57020.「……ううっ 大神官さま。\n 本当に ご無事で 安心しました。:
Oh, Your Holiness.... I'm so relieved to see
that you're safe.

57021.「すまんかったのう……。\n わしが 油断しておったばかりに。: I'm so sorry... I was too careless.

57022.「おお <pc>ではないか。\n ジュアロから そなたと 勇者姫の活躍は\n 聞:
Oh, <pc>? Juaro has told me the
exploits of you and the Princess.

57023.「……情けないところを 見せてしまったのう。\n 突然 押し入ってきた魔物に 妙:
I'm ashamed of myself... a monster suddenly
attacked the Abbey and put a strange spell on
me that stopped me from moving.

57024.「その上 わしの姿が 誰にも見えぬよう\n 消されておったらしく 今しがた\n:
My presence had been completely erased so
that no one would see me. Only now have
I just been found.

57025.「……天願の座にある ダーマのご神体は\n 神の緋石であったということじゃが\n:
The Avatar of Alltrades here in the Divine
Seat has always been the Divine Crimsonite,
as the legends say...

57026.「神の時代。人間の神グランゼニスと\n ダーマの神は よき友人として\n 親交を:
In the age of the gods, the human deity Gran
Zenith and the Allmighty Alltrades were quite
good friends.

57027.「グランゼニス神が 果てたとき\n そのチカラが込められた 石のひとつが\n ダ:
When Gran Zenith fell, one of the stones that
contained his power was entrusted to the
Allmighty Alltrades.

57028.「その石が眠る山を ダーマの神は\n 霊峰ダーマと名づけ 当時の神官たちに\n:
The Allmighty named the mountain where the
stone lies as "Alltrades", and had her priests
build this temple there...

57029.「ダーマのご神体として 未来永劫\n 守り続けるよう 神託を下された……。\n:
A divination told us that this was the "Avatar
of Alltrades"... and that it must be protected
for all of eternity.

57030.「……神の緋石を守ることは 本来\n 我々 ダーマの神官の役目なのじゃよ。:
Essentially, our role as the priests of
Alltrades is to protect the Divine Crimsonite.

57031.「それなのに 今回は そなたたちに\n 助けてもらうことに なってしまったのう。:
And yet, we still had to rely on your help
this time. We deeply apologize...

57032.「<pc>よ。本当に よくやってくれた。\n そなたには 礼のしようもないが\n:
We cannot thank you enough for all you've
done for us. Please accept this.

57033.「勇者の盟友たる そなたの運命は\n この わしにも 計り知れぬ。\n ここで:
I do not know what fate awaits you, Ally of
the Hero. I will stay here and pray for your
safety.

57034.「我々も 祈りましょう。\n <pc>殿の 無事と旅の成功を。:
We shall pray for your safety and success on
your journey.

65701.「その後で あなたも\n ルシェンダさまの所へ 戻ってきてね。\n これで 神の:
After that, report back to Lushenda as well.
All of the Divine Crimsonites are now safe.
